items.description: Upper River Derwent, Stonethwaite Beck and Derwent Water
items.message:
The level of Derwent Water has risen overnight in response to persistent light rain. This is likely to lead to flooding this morning, to roads and low lying land near the lake. Property flooding is not predicted. We expect that the level will start to fall during this morning 09/08/2024.
Flooding is forecast to affect locations near the Upper River Derwent, Stonethwaite Beck and Derwent Water.
Weather conditions are expected to improve this morning and no further flooding is expected.
Take care and avoid walking, cycling or driving through flood water.
This message will be updated by 5:00 PM on 09/08/2024, or as the situation changes.
